shortdesc.ph: Enables instant rendering of audio and video frames.
Enables instant rendering of audio and video frames.

section.p: After calling this method, the SDK enables instant rendering mode to accelerate the rendering of the first frame after the user joins the channel.
After successfully calling this method, the SDK enables instant frame rendering mode, accelerating the rendering of the first frame after the user joins the channel.
section.note: Both host and audience need to call this method to experience instant rendering of audio and video frames. To disable this mode, you must call to destroy the object.

Both broadcasters and audience members need to call this method to experience instant rendering of audio and video frames. Once this method is successfully called, you can only disable instant rendering by calling the method to destroy the object.

section.title: Scenario
section.p: Agora recommends enabling this mode for audience in ultra-low latency live streaming scenarios.

section.title: Timing
section.p: You must call this method before joining a channel.
